user_device_rel: 1 person to n devices; n people to m devices
contribution_desc: JuxtaPinch allows collocated users to share photos on multiple devices. Pinching to connect devices. Multi-screen photo visualization.
crossdevice_def:
"To explore and study opportunities and challenges of user interaction across several mobile platforms [is what's] often referred to as multi-device interaction or cross-device interaction";
cross-device interaction; multi-device interaction
